message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CG 

The paper proposes a novel approach for image-based shape optimization using differentiable rendering of 3D shapes represented by signed distance functions (SDF). This involves techniques from computer vision (image-based shape optimization, multi-view 3D reconstruction, single-view 3D reconstruction), computer graphics (rendering of 3D shapes), machine learning (deep learning models), and optimization (multi-resolution strategy). Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), cs.GR (Computer Graphics), cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.CG (Computational Geometry).
